name: Supermarket Delivery Takeaway - Girls Shopping Day
name_original: Supermarket Delivery Takeaway - Girls Shopping Day
description:
Welcome to the world of Supermarket Delivery Takeaway. This is a supermarket manager cashier game where you will be the delivery boy or delivery girl. Thanksgiving is coming up and it will be a busy season for shopping malls and supermarkets. It is your duty to operate the cash register and indulge in math learning for kids. There are makeup items, supermarket bakery items, dress up outfits and baby shops in the Thanksgiving Supermarket cashier store. Get your hair done in the supermarket hair salon and then participate in the supermarket fashion show.

Enjoy this delivery supermarket game with the added bonus of thanksgiving. It is a baby shop, supermarket hair salon and supermarket fashion show combined into one single shopping mall. You will be delivering supermarket bakery items, makeup items and dress up accessories as the delivery boy or delivery girl. Operating the cash register also includes math learning for kids.

Learn the art of running a thanksgiving supermarket store with this app. You will soon be the best delivery boy or delivery girl by playing our supermarket game. No need to visit the shopping mall or supermarket hair salon because we have it all here. Experience the supermarket fashion show with your friends with a variety of makeup items and dress up things.

Features:
• Realistic Thanksgiving supermarket store environment
• Math learning for kids through the cash register
• Many supermarket goods including bakery items
• Hours of fun at the shopping mall
